block.p: FUSCO-Victor, on May 8, 2000, at age 94. Devoted husband of Marie Carmel Fusco for 62 years. Beloved father of Mariann Hayes, Barbara Ward, Raymond and Edward Fusco. Also survived by nine grandchildren and four greatgrandchildren. Retired executive of Citibank and retired attorney. Funeral Thursday, 9:15AM, from Joseph G. Duffy Funeral Home, 255 9th St., Bklyn. Mass of Christian Burial 9:45AM, St. Saviour Church. Interment Greenwood Cemetery. Visiting Tuesday 7-9PM, and Wednesday 2-5 and 7-9PM.
